img_summary: The image depicts the "Celestial Ribbon," a mythical general armor material in *Black Myth: Wukong*. It is obtainable through various means, including defeating the Hundred-Eye Daoist Master in The Webbed Hollow, defeating bosses in Flaming Mountain and Mount Huaguo, purchasing it from the Shrine in Mount Huaguo, or occasionally finding it in chests. The item plays a role in crafting or upgrading armor in the game.
